title: Military & Spooky Songs & Loops For Games
description: Professional Military, Fighting and Spooky music for games!
longDescription:
A selection of professional game music, loops and stings a Military, Fighting and Spooky vibe. Great for war, spooky, scary, fighting, action, high impact type action games and projects.


Works great for and game or project that requires high quality professional music.


Audio demo: Military & Spooky Songs & Loops For Games


Video demo: Military & Spooky Songs & Loops
technicalDetails:
Features: Each track includes has a full length version, loopable version and stinger version in WAV format.
